item.title: Help anyone (Flying Carpet)
item.dc:creator: @chrham_1997 chrham_1997
item.description:
@chrham_1997 wrote:

Hi, i wanna make Flying Carpet so i can handle self.
That i have done:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpet") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(2262); playerSE = 2261; playerSEW = 2261; playerSER = 2261; playerSEA = 2261; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("Flying Carpet :D"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("carpetoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Flying carpet off!"); setAnimation(2264); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

But when i type in the code in my server it makes only a invisible carpet
and i can move.
But when i do ::emote 2262 i get a visible carpet but i cant move.

Can you help me out please?

Read full topic
